verses.verse: <S%G1722>Under<s%> <S%G3739>these<s%> <S%G1722>circumstances,<s%> after so <S%G3461>many<s%> <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> had <S%G1996>gathered<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> that they were <S%G2662>stepping<s%> on <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> He <S%G757>began<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> [of all,] <S%G4337>"Beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G5272>hypocrisy.<s%>
"But there is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4780>covered<s%> up that will not be <S%G601>revealed,<s%> and <S%G2927>hidden<s%> that will not be <S%G1097>known.<s%>

<S%G473>"Accordingly,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> you have <S%G3004>said<s%> in the <S%G4653>dark<s%> shall be <S%G191>heard<s%> in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> and <S%G3739>what<s%> you have <S%G2980>whispered<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3775><s%> in the <S%G5009>inner<s%> <S%G5009>rooms<s%> shall be <S%G2784>proclaimed<s%> upon the <S%G1430>housetops.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, My <S%G5384>friends,<s%> do not be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G615>kill<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> that they can <S%G4160>do.<s%>

"But I will <S%G5263>warn<s%> you <S%G5101>whom<s%> to <S%G5399>fear:<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> the One who <S%G3326>after<s%> He has <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G1685>cast<s%> into <S%G1067>hell;<s%> <S%G3483>yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G5399>fear<s%> Him!

"Are not <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4765>sparrows<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> for <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G787>cents<s%>? And [yet] not <S%G1520>one<s%> of them is <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G235>"Indeed,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2532>very<s%> <S%G2359>hairs<s%> of your <S%G2776>head<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G705>numbered.<s%> Do not <S%G5399>fear;<s%> you are of <S%G1308>more<s%> <S%G1308>value<s%> than <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4765>sparrows.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3670>confesses<s%> Me <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> shall <S%G3670>confess<s%> him <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
but he who <S%G720>denies<s%> Me <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall be <S%G533>denied<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"And <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G3004>speak<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> it shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him; but he who <S%G987>blasphemes<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> it shall not be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him.

"And <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G1533>bring<s%> you <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and the <S%G746>rulers<s%> and the <S%G1849>authorities,<s%> do not become <S%G3309>anxious<s%> about <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you should <S%G626>speak<s%> in your <S%G626>defense,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you should <S%G3004>say;<s%>
for the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> will <S%G1321>teach<s%> you in that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G3004>say.<s%> "

And <S%G5100>someone<s%> in the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G3307>divide<s%> the [family] <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> with me."
But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G444>"Man,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2525>appointed<s%> Me a <S%G2923>judge<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3312>arbiter<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> you?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3708>"Beware,<s%> and be on your <S%G5442>guard<s%> <S%G575>against<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>form<s%> of <S%G4124>greed;<s%> for not [even] <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4052>has<s%> an <S%G4052>abundance<s%> does his <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1510>consist<s%> of his <S%G5225>possessions.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>told<s%> them a <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5561>land<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G2164>very<s%> <S%G2164>productive.<s%>

"And he began <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3754>since<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4226>place<s%> to <S%G4863>store<s%> my <S%G2590>crops<s%>?'

"And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> is what I will <S%G4160>do:<s%> I will <S%G2507>tear<s%> <S%G2507>down<s%> my <S%G596>barns<s%> and <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3173>larger<s%> <S%G3173>ones,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> I will <S%G4863>store<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G4621>grain<s%> and my <S%G18>goods.<s%>

'And I will <S%G3004>say<s%> to my <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G5590>"Soul,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G18>goods<s%> <S%G2749>laid<s%> up for <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> [to come;] <S%G373>take<s%> your <S%G373>ease,<s%> <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> [and] be <S%G2165>merry.<s%>"'

"But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'You <S%G878>fool!<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> [very] <S%G3571>night<s%> your <S%G5590>soul<s%> is <S%G523>required<s%> of you; and [now] <S%G5101>who<s%> will own <S%G3739>what<s%> you have <S%G2090>prepared<s%>?'
<S%G3779>"So<s%> is the man who <S%G2343>lays<s%> up <S%G2343>treasure<s%> for <S%G848>himself,<s%> and is not <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, do not be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> for [your] <S%G5590>life,<s%> [as to] <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G2068>eat;<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> for your <S%G4983>body,<s%> [as to] <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G1746>put<s%> on.
"For <S%G5590>life<s%> is <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G5160>food,<s%> and the <S%G4983>body<s%> than <S%G1742>clothing.<s%>

<S%G2657>"Consider<s%> the <S%G2876>ravens,<s%> for they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4687>sow<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2325>reap;<s%> and they have <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5009>storeroom<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G596>barn;<s%> and [yet] <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5142>feeds<s%> them; <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G1308>valuable<s%> you are than the <S%G4071>birds!<s%>
"And <S%G5101>which<s%> of you by being <S%G3309>anxious<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4369>add<s%> a [single] <S%G4083>cubit<s%> to his life's <S%G2244>span<s%>?

<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3761><s%> do <S%G3761>even<s%> a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>little<s%> <S%G1646>thing,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are you <S%G3309>anxious<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3062>matters<s%>?

<S%G2657>"Consider<s%> the <S%G2918>lilies,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they <S%G837>grow;<s%> they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2872>toil<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3514>spin;<s%> but I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> did not <S%G4016>clothe<s%> himself <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3778>these.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G7009>arrays<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> in the <S%G68>field,<s%> which is [alive] <S%G4594>today<s%> and <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> is <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G2823>furnace,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> [will He clothe] you, O <S%G3640>men<s%> of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith!<s%>
"And do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G2068>eat,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink,<s%> and do not keep <S%G3349>worrying.<s%>

"For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1934>eagerly<s%> <S%G1934>seek;<s%> but your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> that you <S%G5535>need<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>
"But <S%G2212>seek<s%> for His <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> shall be <S%G4369>added<s%> to you.
"Do not be <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G4168>flock,<s%> for your <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G2106>chosen<s%> <S%G2106>gladly<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

<S%G4453>"Sell<s%> your <S%G5225>possessions<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G1654>charity;<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G905>purses<s%> which do not <S%G3822>wear<s%> out, an <S%G413>unfailing<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1448>comes<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> <S%G1311>destroys.<s%>
"For <S%G3699>where<s%> your <S%G2344>treasure<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> will your <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G2532>also.<s%>
"Be <S%G4024>dressed<s%> in <S%G4024>readiness,<s%> and [keep] your <S%G3088>lamps<s%> <S%G2545>alight.<s%>

"And be <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> who are <S%G4327>waiting<s%> for their <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> he <S%G360>returns<s%> from the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> [the door] to him when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> and <S%G2925>knocks.<s%>

<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>master<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> on the <S%G1127>alert<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes;<s%> <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that he will <S%G4024>gird<s%> himself [to serve,] and have them <S%G347>recline<s%> [at the table,] and will <S%G3928>come<s%> up and <S%G1247>wait<s%> on them.

<S%G2579>"Whether<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5438>watch,<s%> <S%G2579>or<s%> <S%G2579>even<s%> in the <S%G5154>third,<s%> and <S%G2147>finds<s%> [them] <S%G3779>so,<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> [slaves].

"And be <S%G1097>sure<s%> of <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3617>head<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> had <S%G3609>known<s%> at <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> the <S%G2812>thief<s%> was <S%G2064>coming,<s%> he would not have <S%G863>allowed<s%> his <S%G3624>house<s%> to be <S%G1358>broken<s%> into.
"You <S%G2532>too,<s%> be <S%G2092>ready;<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G2064>coming<s%> at an <S%G5610>hour<s%> that you do not <S%G1380>expect.<s%>"

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> are You <S%G3004>addressing<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to us, <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> [else] as <S%G2532>well<s%>?"

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G5429>sensible<s%> <S%G3623>steward,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>master<s%> will <S%G2525>put<s%> in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of his <S%G2322>servants,<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> them their <S%G4620>rations<s%> at the <S%G2540>proper<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>?
<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is that <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G2147>finds<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes.<s%>
<S%G230>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that he will <S%G2525>put<s%> him in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G5225>possessions.<s%>

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> that <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> 'My <S%G2962>master<s%> will be a <S%G5549>long<s%> <S%G5549>time<s%> in <S%G2064>coming,<s%>' and <S%G757>begins<s%> to <S%G5180>beat<s%> the <S%G3814>slaves,<s%> <S%G3816><s%> [both] <S%G3816>men<s%> and <S%G3814>women,<s%> and to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> and <S%G3182>get<s%> <S%G3182>drunk;<s%>

the <S%G2962>master<s%> of that <S%G1401>slave<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> on a <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>when<s%> he does not <S%G4328>expect<s%> [him,] and at an <S%G5610>hour<s%> he does not <S%G1097>know,<s%> and will <S%G1371>cut<s%> him in <S%G1371>pieces,<s%> and <S%G5087>assign<s%> him a <S%G3313>place<s%> with the <S%G571>unbelievers.<s%>

"And that <S%G1401>slave<s%> who <S%G1097>knew<s%> his master's <S%G2307>will<s%> and did not <S%G2090>get<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4160>act<s%> in <S%G4314>accord<s%> with his <S%G2307>will,<s%> shall <S%G1194>receive<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1194>lashes,<s%>

but the one who did not <S%G1097>know<s%> [it,] and <S%G4160>committed<s%> deeds <S%G514>worthy<s%> of a <S%G4127>flogging,<s%> will <S%G1194>receive<s%> but <S%G3641>few.<s%> And from <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has been <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> shall <S%G4183>much<s%> be <S%G523>required;<s%> and to <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G3908>entrusted<s%> <S%G4183>much,<s%> of him they will <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G4057>all<s%> the <S%G4057>more.<s%>
"I have <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and <S%G5101>how<s%> I <S%G2309>wish<s%> it were <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G381>kindled!<s%>
"But I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G908>baptism<s%> to <S%G907>undergo,<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G4912>distressed<s%> I am <S%G2193>until<s%> it is <S%G5055>accomplished!<s%>
